mapper.sql: rr.id, rr.org_id, rr.org_name, rr.retailer, rr.retailer_short,rr.accurl_id, rr.retailer_coding, rr.retailer_type, rr.area_id,rr.area_name, rr.linkman, rr.contact_number, rr.address, rr.remark, rr.accessory, rr.create_time, rr.create_men, rr.update_time, rr.update_men, rr.enable

id, org_id, org_name, retailer, retailer_short,accurl_id, retailer_coding, retailer_type, area_id,area_name, linkman, contact_number, address, remark, accessory, create_time, create_men, update_time, update_men, enable

sql.set:
rr.org_id=#{orgId},
rr.org_name=#{orgName},
rr.retailer=#{retailer},
rr.retailer_short=#{retailerShort},
rr.retailer_coding=#{retailerCoding},
rr.retailer_type=#{retailerType},
rr.area_id=#{areaId},
rr.area_name=#{areaName},
rr.linkman=#{linkman}, rr.contact_number=#{contactNumber}, rr.address=#{address}, rr.remark=#{remark},
rr.accessory=#{accessory},
rr.create_time=#{createTime},
rr.create_men=#{createMen},
rr.update_time=#{updateTime},
rr.update_men=#{updateMen},
rr.enable=#{enable},
rr.accurl_id=#{accurlId},

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lar_recycle_retailer rr WHERE id=#{id}

rr.id IN
#{id}
false
mapper.update:
UPDATE lar_recycle_retailer rr SET rr.enable = 1
rr.id IN
#{id}
false

FROM lar_recycle_retailer rr
rr.id IN

FROM lar_recycle_retailer rr
1=1
